sys_remote_update_set.description:
Providing a summary on this ticket based upon our last meeting on 11/28:
Tim McGeath is apart of 8004 - Admin Department. The delegated department head for this department is Barbara Burcope; therefore, when a legal request is created and the "requested for" field contains any user within 8004 – Admin (Tim McGeath, Jay Khan, Rich Schneider, etc.) the approver will be Barbara. The root cause is how the groups are defined in AD, which trickles down from Ulti Pro. Using a business rule to change the department head of 8004 – Admin will not resolve the issue.
There are 3 options at this time that have been reviewed with Kerry: 1.) Disable automatically populating Department Head and force it to be a manual process – Least Favorable 2.) Discuss with finance and have all department heads added to their own cost code in Ulti Pro in turn modifying AD – Permanent Fix from the top down 3.) Add an If condition within the Workflow to force approval to individual in "requested for" field – Band-Aid to incident
There's not a perfect solution to this issue because even if you fix the problem from the top down, we need to make sure changes going forward aren't made in ulti pro to departments, which will have a direct impact with the ServiceNow Legal System.
sys_remote_update_set.name: INC0126136_LEGAL_RK_v1

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_50fb522c13368700d80074c66144b00c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ValidateExecutive</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ValidateExecutive</name><script><![CDATA[function ValidateExecutive(current_user) {
    var object = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
    object.addEncodedQuery('group.name=Legal Exec Override^userLIKE' + current_user);
    object.query();
    while (object.next()) {
        if (object.user.name == current_user) {
            return true;
        } else {
			return false;
		}
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rwKeller</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-11-29 19:45:33</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>50fb522c13368700d80074c66144b00c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ValidateExecutive</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_50fb522c13368700d80074c66144b00c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rwKeller</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-11-29 20:37:32</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: ecc_agent_script_file_683610cc133a0700d80074c66144b05c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<record_update sys_domain="global" table="ecc_agent_script_file"><ecc_agent_script_file action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><directory>false</directory><name>Get-ADMembers.ps1</name><parent display_value="PowerShell">ef89e4fc372001006b882d465abe5d60</parent><script>function GroupMemberLookup($GroupName) {
    $Output = @() 

    try {
        Get-ADGroupMember -Identity $GroupName -Recursive -ErrorAction Stop | Select-Object -Property Name, SamAccountName | ForEach-Object {
            $Output = "`"" + $_.SamAccountName + "`"" + $Output
        }
    } catch {
        $_
    }

    Write-Output -InputObject ("{`"username`":" + "[" + $Output.Replace('""','","') + "]" + "}")
}

GroupMemberLookup($GroupName.ToString())</script><source/><sys_class_name>ecc_agent_script_file</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rwKeller</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-11-27 20:44:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>683610cc133a0700d80074c66144b05c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get-ADMembers.ps1</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>ecc_agent_script_file_683610cc133a0700d80074c66144b05c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rwKeller</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-01 16:53:22</sys_updated_on><version/></ecc_agent_script_file></record_update>
